ar: رِجَالٌ صَدَقُوا مَا عَهَدُوا اللَّهَ عَلَيْهِ
en: men true to what they promised Allah.
true to what they promised Allah.
Among them is he who has fulfilled his vow [to the death],
Among them is he who has fulfilled his vow [to the death],
and among them is he who awaits [his chance].
And they did not alter [the terms of their commitment] by any alteration -
And they did not alter [the terms of their commitment] by any alteration -
That Allah may reward the truthful for their truth
That Allah may reward the truthful for their truth
and punish the hypocrites if He wills
Indeed, Allah is ever Forgiving and Merciful.
